General.Name: GenNBio Inc
General.Description: GenNBio Inc. operates in the bio industry in South Korea. It engages in the development of heterogeneous organs and new drugs, as well as operates a transplant specialized hospital. The company was formerly known as KD Nature & Bio CO.,LTD and changed its name to GenNBio Inc. in December 2018. GenNBio Inc. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
General.Address: #203, Brown Stone Beomeo, Daegu, South Korea
